targets.query: SELECT max("host_value") FROM (SELECT  last("value") AS "host_value" FROM "two_hour"."pravega_segmentstore_segment_write_latency_ms_percentile" WHERE ("phi" = '0.99' AND "host" =~ /.*$host.*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host")

SELECT max("host_value") FROM (SELECT  last("value") AS "host_value" FROM "two_hour"."pravega_segmentstore_storage_write_latency_ms_percentile" WHERE ("phi" = '0.99' AND "host" =~ /.*$host.*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host")

SELECT max("host_value") FROM (SELECT  last("value") AS "host_value" FROM "two_hour"."pravega_segmentstore_bookkeeper_write_latency_ms_percentile" WHERE ("phi" = '0.99' AND "host" =~ /.*$host.*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host")

SELECT max("host_value") FROM (SELECT  last("value") AS "host_value" FROM "two_hour"."pravega_segmentstore_bookkeeper_total_write_latency_ms_percentile" WHERE ("phi" = '0.99' AND "host" =~ /.*$host.*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host")

SELECT max("host_value") FROM (SELECT  last("value") AS "host_value" FROM "two_hour"."pravega_segmentstore_segment_read_latency_ms_percentile" WHERE ("phi" = '0.99' AND "host" =~ /.*$host.*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host")

SELECT max("host_value") FROM (SELECT  last("value") AS "host_value" FROM "two_hour"."pravega_segmentstore_storage_read_latency_ms_percentile" WHERE ("phi" = '0.99' AND "host" =~ /.*$host.*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host")
SELECT mean("value")  / 10 FROM "pravega_segmentstore_segment_write_bytes_global" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)

panels.title: BK Write Queue Fill Rate Distribution
